header.name: Betatron Cleaning Inefficiency 3.5TeV Beam 1
header.desc: Betatron cleaning inefficiecies resulting in proton losses on the TCTH at 3.5TeV for Beam 1
header.misc: Horizontal halo, beam lifetime 30h ProtLossProbPerTurn = 1/(LifeTime*BunchFreq) = 8.2341e-10, ProtLossFractionOnTct = ProtOnTct/ProtSim = 4.76e-5, BeamProtInFile = LossSim/(ProtLossProbPerTurn*ProtLossFractionOnTct) = 6.0116e17
